posts.postText:
"drgmonkey" STEAM_0:0:25473029  1:42:27 125 0 active

So I just joined on lost temple, was traitor, but I was eatting at same time, so I was afk when DRGMoneky came up to me and aimed at my head and killed me for no reason. He said he thought I was in the traitor menu, which is in my opinion a bull shit reason. I have very few evidence, but its the best i could provide. It's a chatlog. I figured I'd take a screenshot instead of copy and pasting the actual thing.
 http://img230.imageshack.us/img230/8559/evidenceh.png 


Also in a way he was killing an AFK, as I was unable to control as I was eatting. Which is rule breaking. I hope that he can be punished in some way.

- [NNJG] Shin Chan.

Well, it was only one kill. If the person only killed you once, i recommend trying to calm down and just getting over it.
But since he did break a rule or two, in my opinion i would say 2 day ban but that's just me.
Doh! Forgot the format! I tried editing it in but it wouldn't let me. Sorry...
It's fine, just remember to next time.
